title: Basic music industry skills
brief_description: Basic Music Industry Skills is an accredited Certificate Level Course suitable for use across the Years 9 to 12 curriculum. It is divided into modules focusing on different aspects of the music industry. Geared specifically to a teenage audience, it is nevertheless both informative and entertaining.
